metadata.dc:author: Fontana Compiano, L O
Ferrero Doria, R
Rodríguez de Ledesma Vega, J M
metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVE To describe a case of rupture of the corpora cavernosa demonstrated by intracavernosal PGE1. METHODS/RESULTS Herein we describe a patient with fracture of the penis in whom the degree of injury could not be determined by questioning and clinical inspection. The artificial erection test with intracavernosal PGE1 was utilized to evaluate the ruptured corpora cavernosa. CONCLUSION Intracavernous PGE1 is useful in the diagnosis of rupture of the corpora cavernosa and has minimum side effects.
metadata.dc:title: Utilidad de la prostaglandina E1 en el diagnóstico de la fractura de cuerpos cavernosos. A propósito de un caso.
[Usefulness of prostaglandin E1 in the diagnosis of corpora cavernosa fracture. Report of a case].
